item.content: He thinks that it is important that only those who are competent make decisions that are important.
When offered a lot, he choses not to take so much of it. He thinks that for being comfortable, he does not need much.
He thinks that is important to be persistent. When he is convinced of something, he thinks sticking to it is a good thing.
He thinks that only when he is disciplined, he will accomplish something in life. He thinks that it is important for him to maintain control over himself.
He thinks that having a goal in mind to work for is important. He thinks that it is honourable to have clear ambition in life.
He thinks that it is good to be open to change. Only if he is flexible, he thinks, will he be able to deal with life.
Others are important to him. He thinks that is good to help even if he does not get anything in return.
He thinks that it is important that things are done in the correct way. He believes, things work out only when done carefully, precise, and accurate.
From time to time, it is important for him that people enjoy their lives. He can think of many things that make life comfortable.
For him it is very important to life around people who look after each other. He believes that a strong community is crucial.
He thinks that it is unfair if people are treated differently, depending on certain attributes they have. People should have an equal chance to participate.
He thinks that it important that every group in society is proportionally represented. To him, fair decisions should only be made when everyone has an equal saying in it.
He is convinced that it is good to help each other out. He believes that people should support each other more.
It is important to him to have strong leadership. He thinks that complicated decisions should be made by those in charge.
He believes that it is important to work hard in order to achieve things in life.
It is important to him that in important decisions those that are affected have a say in it.
He thinks that it is okay to make mistakes. He thinks that people should learn to accept other peopleâ€™s or their own shortcomings.
It is important for him that things are being planned carefully. He believes that it a good plan is essential to most things.
For him, life is about self-realization. He believes that it is important to do the things in life that are interesting and that help himself to grow.
He thinks that not everything needs a plan. For him it is important to sometimes be open to do things spontaneously.
In his view, tradition can help people to orient themselves and give them stability. He therefore believes that tradition it is very important.
Is his view, society should not be restrictive, and anyone should have the chance to stand up for themselves. He thinks that being independent is very important.
In his view, society would work a lot better if people behaved responsible. It is important for him to think about the people around him.
He believes that the world is changing rapidly. He therefore thinks that willingness to change is essential.
He believes that everyone in society should enjoy life more. For him it makes not much sense for a society to suppress the individual needs with social norms.
